code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectCart=function selectCart(state){return state.cart;};export var selectCartItem=createSelector([selectCart],function(cart){return cart.item;});export var selectCartHidden=createSelector([selectCart],function(cart){return cart.hidden;});export var selectCartItemCount=createSelector([selectCartItem],function(item){return item.reduce(function(accoumulator,cartItemQuantity){return accoumulator+Number(cartItemQuantity.quantity);},0);});export var selectCartPrice=createSelector([selectCartItem],function(cart){return cart.reduce(function(accoumulator,cartItemQuantity){return accoumulator+cartItemQuantity.quantity*Number(cartItemQuantity.price);},0);});
